Posts.Content: HI ,I AM SHELLYL.I READ YUR REPLY FOR KATHERINE.I REALLY WANT TO KNOW ABOUT YOUR SUCCESS STORY.PLEASE DO SEND ME SOME LIST IF FOODS GOOD FOR CANCER,AS  I AM A CAREGIVER .MY HUSBAND HAS BEEN DIAGNOSED WITH  A VERY UNIQUE TYPE OF CANCER,AMPULLA OF THE VETAR. HIS ONCOLOGIST TOLD ME HE HAS FEW MONTHS EVEN IF HE TAKE THE CHEMO! I AM TRYING MY BEST TO REVERESE WHAT HIS ONCOLOGIST SAID,AS I BELIEVE IN MY LORD ,WHO IS THE BEST ONCOLOGIST.   MY HUSBAND DONT FEEL LIKE EATING ,ALL HE WANTS TO EAT IS SWEET THINGS ,WHICH IS NOT GOOD AS I HEARD CANCER CELLS LIVE N GROW WITH SUGAR ??? I AM SO DESPARATE WHAT TO DO?
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Liver Mets Survivors
